sources.title: Four Wheels, No Brakes (1954)
sources.description: Pete Hothead decides to buy a new car to replace his old beat-up jalopy. Meanwhile, his wife has won a new car on a television quiz show that is the same make and model as the car Pete purchases from a car-dealer. Pete arrives home and sees the car his wife won and mistakes it for the one he ordered from the dealer, but it is a different color. He drives it back to the showroom for a replacement, and that begins the first of many problems he is to encounter. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/four-wheels-no-brakes-1954/

metadata.Plot: Pete Hothead decides to buy a new car to replace his old beat-up jalopy. Meanwhile, his wife has won a new car on a television quiz show that is the same make and model as the car Pete purchases from a car-dealer. Pete arrives home and sees the car his wife won and mistakes it for the one he ordered from the dealer, but it is a different color. He drives it back to the showroom for a replacement, and that begins the first of many problems he is to encounter.
metadata.Writer: Fred Grable, Ted Parmelee, Gerald Schnitzer
metadata.Actors: Jerry Hausner, Jim Backus, Marian Richman
